The DGLegacy速 Chrome Extension is designed to simplify the management of your digital and financial assets. With this powerful tool, you can effortlessly search, catalog, and secure your important accounts and documents, ensuring they are protected and accessible to your beneficiaries. Trusted by users worldwide, the DGLegacy速 extension integrates seamlessly into your browsing experience, making asset management easier and more efficient than ever.

Key Features:
 --- Effortless Asset Management: Easily add financial accounts, online services, and important documents to your DGLegacy速 account with just a few clicks.
 --- Automatic Detection: The extension automatically detects relevant assets on the websites you visit and prompts you to add them to your legacy planning.
 --- Secure Storage: Keep all your digital and financial assets in one secure place, ensuring they are protected and accessible when needed.
 --- User-Friendly Interface: The extension is designed to be intuitive and easy to use, making asset management straightforward and stress-free.
 --- Peace of Mind: Ensure that your loved ones have access to your important information and assets, providing peace of mind for the future.

Install the DGLegacy速 Chrome Extension today and take the first step towards securing your digital legacy!
